Package: io.vertx.groovy.ext.shell.io

[Groovy] Class Tty

    • io.vertx.groovy.ext.shell.io.Tty

    • Provide interactions with the Shell TTY.

      • Methods Summary

          Tty eventHandler(EventType eventType, Handler<Void> handler)

          @return
          Returns:
          the current height, i.e the number of columns or if unknown

          Set a stream on the standard input to read the data.

          Set an handler the standard input to read the data in String format.

          @return
          Returns:
          the standard output for emitting data
          int width()
          @return
          Returns:
          the current width, i.e the number of rows or if unknown
